title: Ticket #2144: Write test for condor_ssh_to_job
description: condor_ssh_to_job doesn't currently have any tests. A simple smoke test would be helpful to prevent breaking the tool in the future.
remarks:
2011-May-17 19:53:47 by slauson:
Attached a simple test for condor_ssh_to_job. Assigned to Greg for review.
